description: I 'm Jacques from France (Paris) , a protestant Christian man , involved in higher education and running a team of teachers-researchers in Applied Mathematics to Computer Science . I have a world citizen mindset and I feel so much concerned about other cultures and about what’s happening in the rest of the world ! I also studied Theology and Philosophy (doctoral studies) . I’m fond of literature as well and I like very much writing ( poetry, short novels and essays) . My friends usually say that consideration , humour , creativeness and gentleness are my main qualities. I learnt a lot about mankind and people in general thanks to long-journeys and globe-trotting.
